name: Tapple
description:
Tapple! Collect apples from trees and deliver them to the hungry in exchange for coins. Tap those trees for some delicious apples, albeit bouncy ones! You might want to get a running start. 

How To Play:

  • Sprint into trees to knock down apples.
  • Catch the apples in the basket in order to turn them in. 
  • Left click on an NPC to sell the apples.
  • Follow the objective instructions.

Explore different game modes:

  • Collection: Collect number of requested apples.
  • Collection (Timed): Collect number of requested apples in time.
  • Starvation: Feed the hungry before its too late
  • Collect apples for the hungry.

Hint:

  • You can't pick up apples that fall to the ground.

This game was made for Weekly Game Jam #211 within 3 days. 

Credits

UI, Gameplay Programming  by  Kyle Meyerhardt

Game Design, Audio, and Art  by  Carly Meyerhardt

Google Font: Modak

Source: GitHub - Tapple: A Game About Tapping Trees for Apples
